0x70FA2AFA.name: CREATE_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER

params.name: modifierName
params.description: The new timecycle name, must be unique.

0x70FA2AFA.description: Create a clean timecycle modifier. See [`SET_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER_VAR`](#\_0x6E0A422B) to add variables.

examples.code:
local modifierName = "my_awesome_timecycle"
local createdIndex = CreateTimecycleModifier(modifierName)

if createdIndex ~= -1 then
  SetTimecycleModifier(modifierName)
end

0x70FA2AFA.resultsDescription: The created timecycle modifier index, or -1 if failed.
